citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The farm where the pigs on the Ictero protocol are held post op has not yet been inspected by the IACUC . The IACUC
inspection is to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Regulations . The IACUC shall inspect once every 6 months
all of the research facility's animal facilities. CORRECT BY : 10/30/23

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The Ictero protocol reviewed at time of the inspection, only describes non survival surgery . Medical records indicate that
pigs # 07. 08 and 09 were recovered from surgery , transported to the vendors farm for post op monitoring , had sedated
ultrasounds and then euthanized over a month later. This is a significant change in activity involving animals . The
proposal must contain a complete description of the proposed use of animals and approved by the IACUC prior to the
change in activity.
CORRECT BY : 10/12/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The farm where the pigs on the Ictero protocol are held post op has not yet been inspected by the IACUC . The IACUC 
inspection is to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Regulations . The IACUC shall inspect once every 6 months 
all of the research facility's animal facilities. CORRECT BY : 10/30/23 
2.31(e)(3)  Critical
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The Ictero protocol reviewed at time of the inspection, only describes non survival surgery . Medical records indicate that 
pigs # 07. 08 and 09 were recovered from surgery , transported to the vendors farm for post op monitoring , had sedated 
ultrasounds and then euthanized over a month later. This is a significant change in activity involving animals . The 
proposal must contain a complete description of the proposed use of animals and approved by the IACUC prior to the 
change in activity.  
CORRECT BY : 10/12/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
